page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: Agricultural land is limited in area.Some is classified as Ministry of Agriculture,grade 3, medium quality.Farms in this D-block are about 50 ha. in size.{ The majority of farmland is pasture.Some of this is improved grassland. Some farms specialise in rearing pigs, others rear pigs and beef cattle. Occasionally sheep are bought in to be fattened. Some farmers are owner occupiers and others are tenants. See{Training {Areas}. Farming does not employ very many people.Skilled stockmen are needed.
